Package io.j4c.config.spi

Class AbstractConfigSource<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.j4c.config.spi.AbstractSource<ConfigNode.ObjectNode,S>
      • io.j4c.config.spi.AbstractConfigSource<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - a type of data stamp
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Changeable<S>, ConfigSource, Source<S>, Supplier<S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractParsableConfigSource

    public abstract class AbstractConfigSource<S>
extends AbstractSource<ConfigNode.ObjectNode,S>
implements ConfigSource
    A base abstract implementation of ConfigSource ready to be extended by any config source implementation that provides a common implementation of Config Source SPI.
    See Also:
    AbstractConfigSource.Builder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  AbstractConfigSource.Builder<B extends AbstractConfigSource.Builder<B,T>,T>
      A common ConfigSource builder ready to be extended by builder implementation related to ConfigSource extensions.

      • changes

        public final Flow.Publisher<Optional<ConfigNode.ObjectNode>> changes​()
        Allows to subscribe on changes on source.

        It's up to Source implementation if it supports change notifications.

        Method Flow.Subscriber.onError(Throwable) is called in case of error listening on config source data. Method Flow.Subscriber.onComplete() is never called.

        All subscribers are notified using specified executor.

        Specified by:
        changes in interface Changeable<S>
        Specified by:
        changes in interface Source<S>
        Returns:
        a publisher of events. Never returns null
